item.title: Body of man missing for 28 years found ‘perfectly preserved’ in glacier
item.description: Naseeruddin vanished in 1997 after a family dispute.

item.title: Rat the size of a dog found as monster vermin run riot in Yorkshire village
item.description: The dead rodent - potentially record-breaking because of its size – has been likened by witnesses to a small dog.

item.title: Girl, 3, unaware 7ft constrictor snake was slithering in her bedroom while she played
item.description: Natasha Robinson thought her fiancé was playing a prank when discovered the Taiwanese Beauty Rat Snake in their children's bedroom.

item.title: We’re one step closer to living on the Moon – and it’s thanks to something ‘magic’
item.description: Nasa hopes to build homes for astronauts and civilians on the Moon by 2040.

item.title: Mysterious ‘glowing orb’ eerily hovers over couple’s home in Canada
item.description: 'I never thought I’d see anything like that in my lifetime.'
